title: Generative AI as a Safety Net for Survey Question Refinement
summary: This paper explores the use of generative AI to assist in the demanding task of writing and refining survey questions. It highlights the challenges in creating clear and accurate survey questions and proposes AI as a tool to identify and resolve potential errors, thereby improving the quality of collected data.
